metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10191 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in libavformat/rtmppkt.c in FFmpeg before2.8.10, 3.0.x before 3.0.5, 3.1.x before 3.1.6, and 3.2.x before 3.2.2allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging failure tocheck for RTMP packet size mismatches.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
